      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_107327</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Convection currents from warm and cold objects</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konvektionströme von den warmen und kalten 
Nachrichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courants de convection des objets chauds et 
froids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Correntes do convection dos objetos mornos e 
frios</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Correnti di convezione dagli oggetti caldi e 
freddi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρεύματα μεταφοράς από τα θερμά και κρύα αντικείμενα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corrientes de la convección de objetos calientes
y fríos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These figures show convection currents from warm objects in a room (left) and a cold object like refrigerator (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cold object</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">convection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">convection current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">freezer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heater</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">warm object</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen Konvektionströme von den
warmen Nachrichten in einem Raum (nach links) und in einer kalten 
Nachricht wie dem Kühlraum (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces figures montrent des courants de convection 
des objets chauds dans une chambre (à gauche) et un objet froid comme
le réfrigérateur (droit).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas figuras mostram correntes do convection dos 
objetos mornos em um quarto (à esquerda) e em um objeto frio como o 
refrigerador (direito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste figure mostrano le correnti di convezione 
dagli oggetti caldi in una stanza (a sinistra) ed in un oggetto freddo
come il frigorifero (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτοί οι αριθμοί εμφανίζουν ρεύματα μεταφοράς από τα
θερμά αντικείμενα σε ένα δωμάτιο (αριστερά) και ένα κρύο 
αντικείμενο όπως το ψυγείο (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas figuras muestran corrientes de la 
convección de objetos calientes en un cuarto (a la izquierda) y un 
objeto frío como el refrigerador (derecho).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kalte Nachricht</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Konvektion</string>
